channel.title: Player Models don't work.
channel.description:
I might just be the person with the most problems now... Every time I try to use a new player model, It always stays as Kleiner..
Yes, I have died after selecting the new player model, But it doesn't change..
Any suggestions? Thanks..

item.title: Player Models don't work.
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
The Mindfucker:

How do you even delete mods?

Right Click > Delete > Empty Recycle Bin

item.title: Player Models don't work.
item.dc:creator: Maxaxle
item.description:
Mangled*:

Try doing it in singleplayer, some servers restrict players model for various nonsensical reasons.

Yeah, I know. Sometimes the servers even change your playermodel to keep things simple (or something…).

item.title: Player Models don't work.
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
λdam:

I might just be the person with the most problems now…
Every time I try to use a new player model, It always stays as Kleiner…

Yes, I have died after selecting the new player model, But it doesn’t change…

Any suggestions?
Thanks…

You could specify what game you mean :’(

Should I assume it’s Gmod?

Try doing it in singleplayer, some servers restrict players model for various nonsensical reasons.

item.title: Player Models don't work.
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
GMod is stupid and has a lot of bugs.

no, I have no suggestions, except a complete reinstall of gmod and don’t install lots of mods, it makes gmod unstable.
